schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
                    name TEXT,
                    is_admin BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
                    created_at TEXT DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
                )

CREATE TABLE bow_setups (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    user_id INTEGER,
                    name TEXT NOT NULL,
                    bow_type TEXT,
                    draw_weight REAL,
                    draw_length REAL,
                    created_at TEXT DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
                    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id)
                )
